name: Rosapark
tagline: A unique place where talents will flourish.
description:
Jean-Francois Sacco, Gilles Fichteberg and Jean-Patrick Chiquiar founded ROSAPARK, a 100% integrated and inventive agency, designed to strongly influence the business of its clients. Rosapark's ambition is to create a new offering in the market that will integrate all offline and online communication including social networking, CRM, e-reputation, packaging, design and media expertise.
Rosapark is an exciting, fresh, inventive place, a unique place where talents and customers will flourish.
READ MORE...
